item.subtitle_s: 3rd, 4th year students or recent graduates from College/University majoring in Finance - Banking; or those who have basic knowledge of Banking operations and are looking to learn about career opportunities in the Industry.

item.title_s: Those Who Want to Change Careers
item.subtitle_s: Bank employees in functional departments and divisions who want to change their career orientation to Business Analyst to have better development opportunities in the Industry.

item.title_s: Those Who Are New to BA
item.subtitle_s: Those who are interested in the "Business Analysis" profession of Business Analyst (BA) and want to have an overview of the profession as well as want to know more about the Banking Industry.
